verses.verse: And the <S%G652>apostles<s%> and <S%G80>brothers<s%> that were in <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> had <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G305>come<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> they that were of the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G1252>contended<s%> with him,
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> You <S%G1525>went<s%> in to <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%G2192><s%> and did <S%G4906>eat<s%> with them.
But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G756>rehearsed<s%> the matter from the <S%G756>beginning,<s%> and <S%G1620>expounded<s%> it by <S%G2517>order<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

I was in the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2445>Joppa<s%> <S%G4336>praying:<s%> and in a <S%G1611>trance<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3705>vision,<s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G2597>descend,<s%> as it had been a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3607>sheet,<s%> <S%G2524>let<s%> <S%G2524>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> by <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G746>corners;<s%> and it <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G891>even<s%> to me:

On the <S%G3739>which<s%> when I had <S%G816>fastened<s%> my eyes, I <S%G2657>considered,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> four <S%G5074>footed<s%> <S%G5074>beasts<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and <S%G2342>wild<s%> <S%G2342>beasts,<s%> and <S%G2062>creeping<s%> things, and <S%G4071>fowls<s%> of the <S%G3772>air.<s%>
And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to me, <S%G450>Arise,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter;<s%> <S%G2380>slay<s%> and <S%G5315>eat.<s%>

But I <S%G2036>said,<s%> Not <S%G3365>so,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> for <S%G3956>nothing<s%> <S%G3763><s%> <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> has <S%G3763>at<s%> <S%G3763>any<s%> time <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> my <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

But the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> me <S%G1537>again<s%> <S%G1208><s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> that <S%G2840>call<s%> not you <S%G2839>common.<s%>
And <S%G5124>this<s%> was <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5151>three<s%> <S%G5151>times:<s%> and <S%G537>all<s%> were <S%G385>drawn<s%> up <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1824>immediately<s%> there were <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> already <S%G2186>come<s%> to the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G1722>where<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I was, <S%G649>sent<s%> from <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> to me.

And the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2036>bade<s%> me <S%G4905>go<s%> with them, <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G1252>doubting.<s%> <S%G1161>Moreover<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2064>accompanied<s%> <S%G4862><s%> me, and we <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G435>man's<s%> <S%G3624>house:<s%>

And he <S%G518>showed<s%> us <S%G4459>how<s%> he had <S%G1492>seen<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> in his <S%G3624>house,<s%> which <S%G2476>stood<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G649>Send<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> to <S%G2445>Joppa,<s%> and <S%G3343>call<s%> for <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G3588>whose<s%> <S%G1941>surname<s%> is <S%G4074>Peter;<s%>
<S%G3739>Who<s%> shall <S%G2980>tell<s%> you <S%G4487>words,<s%> <S%G1722>whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you and <S%G3956>all<s%> your <S%G3624>house<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>
And as I <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> them, as <S%G1909>on<s%> us <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G746>beginning.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3415>remembered<s%> I the <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> that he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with <S%G5204>water;<s%> but you shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

For as <S%G1487>much<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> them the <S%G2470>like<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> as he did to us, who <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> was I, that I <S%G1415>could<s%> <S%G2967>withstand<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%>

When they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, they <S%G2270>held<s%> their <S%G2270>peace,<s%> and <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G686>Then<s%> has <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1325>granted<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G3767>Now<s%> they which were <S%G1289>scattered<s%> <S%G1289>abroad<s%> on the <S%G2347>persecution<s%> that <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen<s%> <S%G1330>traveled<s%> as <S%G2193>far<s%> as <S%G5403>Phenice,<s%> and <S%G2954>Cyprus,<s%> and <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> <S%G2980>preaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> to <S%G3367>none<s%> but to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only.<s%>

And <S%G5100>some<s%> of them were <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2954>Cyprus<s%> and <S%G2957>Cyrene,<s%> <S%G3748>which,<s%> when they were <S%G1525>come<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to the <S%G1675>Grecians,<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
And the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was with them: and a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G706>number<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> and <S%G1994>turned<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3056>tidings<s%> of <S%G846>these<s%> things <S%G191>came<s%> to the <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was in <S%G2414>Jerusalem:<s%> and they <S%G1821>sent<s%> <S%G1821>forth<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> that he should <S%G1330>go<s%> as <S%G2193>far<s%> as <S%G490>Antioch.<s%>

<S%G3739>Who,<s%> when he <S%G3854>came,<s%> and had <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> was <S%G5463>glad,<s%> and <S%G3870>exhorted<s%> them <S%G3956>all,<s%> that with <S%G4286>purpose<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> they would <S%G4347>hold<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

For he was a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> and <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> and of <S%G4102>faith:<s%> and <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> was <S%G4369>added<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> to <S%G5019>Tarsus,<s%> for to <S%G327>seek<s%> <S%G4569>Saul:<s%>

And when he had <S%G2147>found<s%> him, he <S%G71>brought<s%> him to <S%G490>Antioch.<s%> And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that a <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> they <S%G4863>assembled<s%> themselves with the <S%G1577>church,<s%> and <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G3793>people.<s%> And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G5537>called<s%> <S%G5546>Christians<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> in <S%G490>Antioch.<s%>
And in <S%G5125>these<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2718>came<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch.<s%>

And there <S%G450>stood<s%> up <S%G1520>one<s%> of them <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G13>Agabus,<s%> and <S%G4591>signified<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> that there <S%G3195>should<s%> be <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>dearth<s%> <S%G1909>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G3625>world:<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass in the <S%G1909>days<s%> of <S%G2804>Claudius<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2531>according<s%> to his <S%G2141>ability,<s%> <S%G3724>determined<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1248>relief<s%> to the <S%G80>brothers<s%> which <S%G2730>dwelled<s%> in <S%G2449>Judaea:<s%>
<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> they <S%G4160>did,<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> it to the <S%G4245>elders<s%> by the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> and <S%G4569>Saul.<s%>
